mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Eleanor Stuart to Tobias Lear, 1790 October 3
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Stuart, Eleanor Calvert Custis, approximately 1758-1811
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Eleanor Calvert Custis Stuart writes from Mount Vernon to Tobias Lear in New York. Received news from the President--lottery and her family, noting that "My Dear Nelly & Wash. are still spoilt by Grand Mama but chearfully obey every word I say to them"--desires to travel to New York and Boston. Autograph letter signed, 3 pages, with integral free franked address panel.
